Ava.Dispatcher.name: Ava.Dispatcher

Ava.View.name: Ava.View

Ava.Bar.name: Ava.Bar
Ava.Bar.description:
Bar (or measure) is a segment of time defined by a given number of
beats, each of which are assigned a particular note value
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bar_%28music%29)
example:
bar = Ava.Bar({
         clef:                 'treble',
         show_clef:            true,
         key_signature:        'G',
         num_beats:            3,
         beat_value:           4,
         show_time_signature:  true,
         show_key_signature:   true,
         notes: [
             { keys: ["d/4"], duration: "q"  },
             { keys: ["b/4"], duration: "qr" },
             { keys: ["c/4"], duration: "q"  },
             { keys: ["d/4"], duration: "q"  },
         ],
     });

params.name: spec
params.description: An object to init a Bar

div_id.

classitems.description: Flag to represent showing of key signature in bar

classitems.description:
Song Key Signature (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Key_signature)

Valid key signature:

"C", "Am", "F", "Dm", "Bb", "Gm", "Eb", "Cm",
"Ab", "Fm", "Db", "Bbm", "Gb", "Ebm", "Cb",
"Abm", "G", "Em", "D", "Bm", "A", "F#m", "E",
"C#m", "B", "G    #m", "F#", "D#m", "C#", "A#m"
classitems.name: key_signature

Find the hot spot for passed y
What is hot spot? Hot spot is the exact y for a line which calculate
